Txapela is located in L'Eixample near the Passeig de Gracia metro stop in an area that is full of high-end luxury retailers, so for us this was the perfect for what was intended to be a 'quick bite'. But perhaps we over-indulged.The outdoor seating is great for those warm nights, and they have a photo-menu (by request) for non-Spanish speaking patrons which is grouped by warm and cold bites.Euskal TabernaPincho Arantxa: gambes, baco i xampinyo a la planxaPincho Binkini Txapela: pernil Iberico, esparrecs, verds i formatgeTolosa: hamburguesa, formatge, i mostassaZaldibi: anxova, tonyina, enciam, ou i maionesaIberic: pernil Iberic de giaZarautz: broqueta de llagostins, amb vinaigrette de caviarBidasoa: rotllet de salmon farcit de cranc i maionesaIgueldo: lamines de tomaqiet amb formatge d'AturaPincho Octopus in Vinaigrette
